TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the authentication setting used for message exchange.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode AnonymousForCertificate = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is anonymous, and that the responder is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The certificate of the responder is available out-of-band to the initiator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode AnonymousForSslNegotiated = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is anonymous.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode CertificateOverTransport = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an X.509 version 3 certificate, and that the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedToken = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated by XML symmetric key tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedTokenForCertificate = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the responder is authenticated by an X.509 version 3 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedTokenForSslNegotiated = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the responder is authenticated by the SOAP implementation of SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode IssuedTokenOverTransport = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by an XML symmetric key token, and that the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode Kerberos = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated using the Kerberos protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode KerberosOverTransport = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using the Kerberos protocol, and the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode MutualCertificate = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated with X.509 version 3 certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode MutualCertificateDuplex = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator and responder are authenticated with X.509 version 3 certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode MutualSslNegotiated = int32(11)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator and responder mutually authenticate each other using X509 version 3 certificates, and the responder's certificate is available from the SOAP SSL negotiation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode SecureConversation = int32(12)

Docs.summary: Specifies that WS-SecureConversation authentication is used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode SspiNegotiated = int32(13)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator and responder obtain a shared security context using the Security Service Provider Interface (SSPI).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode SspiNegotiatedOverTransport = int32(17)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated by a security context using the Security Service Provider Interface (SSPI), and the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode UserNameForCertificate = int32(14)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and the responder's certificate is available to the initiator out-of-band.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode UserNameForSslNegotiated = int32(15)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and that the responder is authenticated by the SOAP implementation of SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode UserNameOverTransport = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the initiator is authenticated using a username token, and that the responder is authenticated by SSL over HTTPS.
